OISInput Class Reference

An Ogre plugin that provides input functionality to OgreGUI using OIS. More...

#include <OISInput.h>

Inheritance diagram for OISInput:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An Ogre plugin that provides input functionality to OgreGUI using OIS.

OISInput is configured from the configuration data in OgreGUI::ConfigFileStream(), if any. See OISInput.cfg for an example config file.
